name: Varronia mariana
distribution: Alagoas (Brazil Northeast, Brazil, Southern America);Bahia (Brazil Northeast, Brazil, Southern America);Paraíba (Brazil Northeast, Brazil, Southern America);Pernambuco (Brazil Northeast, Brazil, Southern America);Rio Grande do Norte (Brazil Northeast, Brazil, Southern America);Sergipe (Brazil Northeast, Brazil, Southern America);
